title: Hurricane Hunters
alt: Our flight gathered valuable data on whether a commercial airliner in the eye of a hurricane can do a loop.
transcript:
[Black hat facing left]
Black Hat: Yes, flying into the eye of a hurricane is dangerous.[Cueball on left at a desk being addressed by Black Hat on the right]
Black Hat: But it provides us with crucial data that helps us understand and predict these storms.[Same as previous cell, with Black Hat raising his hand]
Cueball: But your passengers had bought tickets to St. Louis.
Black Hat: They should be proud of our contributions to meteorology!
